string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: ⚠️ Arcticons is growing faster than ever before, but were also getting numerous icon requests from you! Managing this costs a lot of time, so please be patient with your requests and consider donating! (there are ~200 requests open right now).
🎉 60 new or updated icons (thanks JoelChrono12, Ddavidd!)
